overview: A truly funky, soulful DVD compilation of live performances from the masters of R&B music. Features incredible concert footage of James Brown, Chic, The Pointer Sisters, Dionne Warwick, The Brothers Johnson, The Stylistics and more! Includes the hit singles I Got You (I Feel Good), Le Freak, Strawberry Letter 23, Jump (For My Love), You Make Me Feel Brand New, and Have You Seen Her?
title: 21 Essential Funk & Soul Classics
